hangman.title: Hangman
hangman.description: Hangman is a single-player guessing game. All letters of a random word or sentence must be guessed correctly.

rules.title: Game Rules
items: Guess the word/sentence by suggesting letters.
If you guess the word/sentence before running out of tries, you win!

battleship.title: Battleship
battleship.description: Battleship is a two-player guessing game. The goal is to sink all the opponent's ships before they sink yours.

rules.title: Game Rules
items: Place your ships on the grid.
Take turns guessing the location of the opponent's ships.
If you guess correctly, you hit the ship. If not, it's a miss.
The first player to sink all the opponent's ships wins!
